definition: a piece of turf dug out of a lawn or fairway (by an animals hooves or a golf club)
details:
noun
- a piece of turf dug out of a lawn or fairway (by an animals hooves or a golf club)
- in golf, the cavity left when a piece of turf is cut from the ground by the club head in making a stroke
= example: in golf, the cavity left when a piece of turf is cut from the ground by the club head in making a stroke
